Package io.netty.resolver

Class DefaultNameResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.resolver.SimpleNameResolver<java.net.InetAddress>
      • io.netty.resolver.InetNameResolver
        • io.netty.resolver.DefaultNameResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NameResolver<java.net.InetAddress>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class DefaultNameResolver
extends InetNameResolver
    A InetNameResolver that resolves using JDK's built-in domain name lookup mechanism. Note that this resolver performs a blocking name lookup from the caller thread.
